God Removes Hindrances to Happiness.--God seeks our real happiness. If anything lies in the way of this, He sees it must first be removed. He will thwart our purposes and disappoint our expectations and bring us through disappointments and trials to reveal to us ourselves as we are.... Sin is the cause of all our woes. If we would 

650 

have true peace and happiness of mind, sin must be removed.--Lt 29, 1879. (HC 81.)
